max-spawns-per-block-tick-desc: Max drips a single block can spawn per tick pass.
trail-segments-desc: How many trail particles per streak.
chance-top-edge-desc: Chance a spawned drip becomes a top-edge drip instead of a wall-face drip.
drop-size-desc: Size of each drip particle cube.
face-clearance-desc: How far outside the wall the drip center sits beyond the flush point. Smaller = closer.
topedge-extra-out-desc: Extra outward push for top-edge drips so they don't clip the block below.
wall-min-y-desc: Lowest spawn height on the wall face (0–1 block height).
wall-max-y-desc: Highest spawn height on the wall face (0–1 block height).
trail-length-desc: How far the streak extends downward along the wall.
trail-side-jitter-desc: Side-to-side randomness for the streak line.
wall-probe-in-desc: How far to probe into the block to confirm the wall surface exists.
splash-min-qty-desc: Minimum number of splash particles spawned per impact.
max-distance-desc: Distance from the player beyond which runoff particles won’t spawn.
gravity-const-desc: Controls fall timing used to sync splash to drip impact.
life-padding-desc: Extra lifespan added so the drip doesn’t vanish before the splash.
